refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Every Msg must have one primary message. This is stored in the MsgMain. The primary message is distinguished from any number of submessages (MsgSub) or related messages (MsgRel) that a Msg might have.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: On the whole, the semantics of MsgSet are not clearly defined.
